event.reason: The host DESKTOP01 was seen communicating to the external entity sekoia.io. Communication between these entities was seen 12 times. This external entity is rare in the organization as only 2 hosts within the organization accessed it. This external entity is also rare globally. This external entity was accessed using 1 distinct ports. Based on our machine learning models, this connection was flagged as suspicious

alert.name: Abnormal Recurring Communications to a Rare Domain to a Suspicious Autonomous System (AS)
